description: This file defines a FastAPI application class for a backend API, including initialization, router setup, and server start logic, integrating agents, teams, and workflows.

classes.name: FastAPIApp
classes.description: A class representing a FastAPI-based backend application, managing agents, teams, workflows, and server startup.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the FastAPIApp with agents, teams, workflows, settings, and other configurations, setting app IDs and initializing components.

methods.name: get_router
methods.description: Returns a synchronous API router configured with the current agents, teams, and workflows.

methods.name: get_async_router
methods.description: Returns an asynchronous API router configured with the current agents, teams, and workflows.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Starts the API server using Uvicorn with the specified app, host, port, and reload options, after registering agents, teams, and workflows.
